long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
➡️Boost Your Book Writing Process with AI-Powered Assistance
This extension is a game-changer for authors, aspiring writers, and anyone involved in book creation. It seamlessly integrates with your browser, providing instant access to AI-powered tools designed to streamline and enhance your writing journey.

The AI Book Assistant has specifically designed to work with Inkflow.io 

🟢Key Features:
1️⃣Book Title Generator: Instantly create compelling, genre-specific book titles to kickstart your project or overcome writer's block.
2️⃣Basic Book Outline Creator: Quickly generate a structured outline for your book, complete with chapters and subchapters, tailored to your chosen genre. The structured markdown output is preformatted to align with the inkflow.io import template
3️⃣Advanced Book Outline Generator: Dive deeper with a more detailed outline, perfect for complex narratives or non-fiction works. The structured markdown output is preformatted to align with the inkflow.io import template

🟢Why Install:
⌚Save Time: Generate ideas and structures in seconds, not hours.
🤔Overcome Writer's Block: Get inspired with AI-generated titles and outlines.
👩‍💻Improve Organization: Start your writing process with a clear, well-structured plan.
📝Versatile: Suitable for fiction, non-fiction, and various genres.
😉User-Friendly: Simple interface that integrates smoothly with your browsing experience.

Whether you're a seasoned author or a first-time writer, this extension provides the creative spark and structural support you need to bring your book ideas to life. Transform your writing process and unleash your creativity with just a few clicks!
